languages.text: "Верно. Тебе удалось оценить его потенциал в деле, не так ли, мон-кай? Достаточно ли ты безрассуд{mf|ен|на}, чтобы оказаться на месте Кикеросс и ощутить способности моего {d|Encyclopedia:Ch3_PatchedMonster}нового гротеска{/d} на собственной шкуре?"

traits.locale_text: "Верно. Тебе удалось оценить его потенциал в деле, не так ли, мон-кай? Достаточно ли ты безрассуд{mf|ен|на}, чтобы оказаться на месте Кикеросс и ощутить способности моего нового гротеска на собственной шкуре?"
traits.speaker: DrukhariHaemonculus_MeleeRanged_ReavingTempestSpire

languages.text: "Yes, it is. You had the opportunity to admire its potential in action, didn't you, mon-keigh? Are you senseless enough to follow Keykeross's example and experience my {d|Encyclopedia:Ch3_PatchedMonster}new Grotesque{/d}'s abilities first-hand?"
languages.original_text: "Верно. Тебе удалось оценить его потенциал в деле, не так ли, мон-кай? Достаточно ли ты безрассуд{mf|ен|на}, чтобы оказаться на месте Кикеросс и ощутить способности моего {d|Encyclopedia:Ch3_PatchedMonster}нового гротеска{/d} на собственной шкуре?"

languages.text: « Tout à fait. Vous avez eu la chance d'admirer son potentiel en action, n'est-ce pas, mon-keigh ? Seriez-vous assez stupide pour suivre les pas de Keykeross et faire les frais des capacités de mon {d|Encyclopedia:Ch3_PatchedMonster}nouveau grotesque{/d} ? »
languages.original_text: "Yes, it is. You had the opportunity to admire its potential in action, didn't you, mon-keigh? Are you senseless enough to follow Keykeross's example and experience my {d|Encyclopedia:Ch3_PatchedMonster}new Grotesque{/d}'s abilities first-hand?"

traits.locale_text: « Tout à fait. Vous avez eu la chance d'admirer son potentiel en action, n'est-ce pas, mon-keigh ? Seriez-vous assez stupide pour suivre les pas de Keykeross et faire les frais des capacités de mon nouveau grotesque ? »
traits.speaker: DrukhariHaemonculus_MeleeRanged_ReavingTempestSpire

languages.text: “没错，就是它。你已经亲自欣赏过它的力量了，是吧，猴子？莫非你真的那么愚蠢，打算效尤绮克萝丝的做法，亲自体验一下这位{d|Encyclopedia:Ch3_PatchedMonster}新型怪诞{/d}的力量吗？”
languages.original_text: "Yes, it is. You had the opportunity to admire its potential in action, didn't you, mon-keigh? Are you senseless enough to follow Keykeross's example and experience my {d|Encyclopedia:Ch3_PatchedMonster}new Grotesque{/d}'s abilities first-hand?"

traits.locale_text: “没错，就是它。你已经亲自欣赏过它的力量了，是吧，猴子？莫非你真的那么愚蠢，打算效尤绮克萝丝的做法，亲自体验一下这位新型怪诞的力量吗？”
traits.speaker: DrukhariHaemonculus_MeleeRanged_ReavingTempestSpire

languages.text: 「ああ、そうだ。その潜在能力を実際に拝む機会があっただろう、モン＝ケイ。キーケロスに続いて、私の{d|Encyclopedia:Ch3_PatchedMonster}新しいグロテスク{/d}の能力をじかに体験してしまうほど貴様は愚かなのか？」
languages.original_text: "Yes, it is. You had the opportunity to admire its potential in action, didn't you, mon-keigh? Are you senseless enough to follow Keykeross's example and experience my {d|Encyclopedia:Ch3_PatchedMonster}new Grotesque{/d}'s abilities first-hand?"

traits.locale_text: 「ああ、そうだ。その潜在能力を実際に拝む機会があっただろう、モン＝ケイ。キーケロスに続いて、私の{d|Encyclopedia:Ch3_PatchedMonster}新しいグロテスク{/d}の能力をじかに体験してしまうほど貴様は愚かなのか？」
traits.speaker: DrukhariHaemonculus_MeleeRanged_ReavingTempestSpire

languages.text: "Ja, ist es. Und Ihr hattet ja schon Gelegenheit, sein Potenzial in Aktion zu erleben, nicht wahr, Chem-Pan-Sey? Seid Ihr wirklich so unvernünftig, Keykeross' Beispiel zu folgen und von den Möglichkeiten meiner {d|Encyclopedia:Ch3_PatchedMonster}neuen Groteske{/d} aus erster Hand zu erfahren??"
languages.original_text: "Yes, it is. You had the opportunity to admire its potential in action, didn't you, mon-keigh? Are you senseless enough to follow Keykeross's example and experience my {d|Encyclopedia:Ch3_PatchedMonster}new Grotesque{/d}'s abilities first-hand?"

traits.locale_text: "Ja, ist es. Und Ihr hattet ja schon Gelegenheit, sein Potenzial in Aktion zu erleben, nicht wahr, Chem-Pan-Sey? Seid Ihr wirklich so unvernünftig, Keykeross' Beispiel zu folgen und von den Möglichkeiten meiner neuen Groteske aus erster Hand zu erfahren??"
traits.speaker: DrukhariHaemonculus_MeleeRanged_ReavingTempestSpire

languages.text: «En efecto. Ya tuviste ocasión de admirar su potencial en acción, ¿no es así, mon-keigh? ¿Tan {mf|insensato|insensata} eres que vas a seguir el ejemplo de Keykeross y experimentar de primera mano las capacidades de mi {d|Encyclopedia:Ch3_PatchedMonster}nuevo grotesco{/d}?».
languages.original_text: "Yes, it is. You had the opportunity to admire its potential in action, didn't you, mon-keigh? Are you senseless enough to follow Keykeross's example and experience my {d|Encyclopedia:Ch3_PatchedMonster}new Grotesque{/d}'s abilities first-hand?"

traits.locale_text: «En efecto. Ya tuviste ocasión de admirar su potencial en acción, ¿no es así, mon-keigh? ¿Tan {mf|insensato|insensata} eres que vas a seguir el ejemplo de Keykeross y experimentar de primera mano las capacidades de mi nuevo grotesco?».
traits.speaker: DrukhariHaemonculus_MeleeRanged_ReavingTempestSpire

languages.text: "Yanımda. Potansiyeline şahit olma fırsatın oldu, değil mi mon-keigh? Keykeross'un adımlarını takip edip {d|Encyclopedia:Ch3_PatchedMonster}yeni Groteskimin{/d} becerilerini birinci elden deneyimleyecek kadar akılsız mısın?"
languages.original_text: "Yes, it is. You had the opportunity to admire its potential in action, didn't you, mon-keigh? Are you senseless enough to follow Keykeross's example and experience my {d|Encyclopedia:Ch3_PatchedMonster}new Grotesque{/d}'s abilities first-hand?"

traits.locale_text: "Evet öyle. Potansiyeline şahit olma fırsatın oldu, değil mi mon-keigh? Keykeross'un adımlarını takip edecek ve yeni Grotesk'imin yeteneklerini birinci elden deneyimleyecek kadar akılsız mısın?"
traits.speaker: DrukhariHaemonculus_MeleeRanged_ReavingTempestSpire
